mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member ( user_id, pwd, name, email, birthday, interest, addr1, addr2, reg_date ) values( #{user_id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{interest}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT bp.pro_name as pro_name, bp.pro_price as pro_price, bp.pro_amount as pro_amount FROM bec_product as bp inner join bec_cart AS bc ON bp.pro_idx = bc.pro_idx WHERE member_id = #{m_id}
